bug.author: FeelyChau
bug.summary: The tutorial content 'Get started with Pipeline API' does not exist.
bug.description: hi, all: I can't access this link: https://alibaba.github.io/pipcook/#/tutorials/get-started-with-pipeline-api Is this page removed?

comments.comment: Sorry, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/FeelyChau>@FeelyChau</denchmark-link> We have removed the Pipeline APIs at <denchmark-link:https://github.com/alibaba/pipcook/commit/62ac9184b4627a3ed4c22b9da9afddce66416876>62ac918</denchmark-link> , because we did introduce a static way to describe that, see <denchmark-link:https://github.com/alibaba/pipcook/blob/master/example/pipelines/text-bayes-classification.json>here</denchmark-link> for example. I will update the TOC for the dead link, thank you :)
